price: A ellos Dios los ha maldecido haciendo que se comporten como sordos y ciegos.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
